body:
Chapter 126: Murder

Chapter 126: Murder


Far away in Sea Heaven city, Ren Tianyou naturally didn’t know anything about the matter of Light Empire. He also didn’t know that the purple gauze sky magnificent flower which he had just handed over was already delivered to the hand of the person who had issued this mission.


After completing the mission, Ren Tianyou just put away his new mercenary card and insignia, haven ranked combat skill and magic crystal card inside his space ring. After that he walked out from this mercenary guild.


He cultivate Chakra, so this heaven ranked combat skill of different world was useless to him. Although it didn’t have any use, nevertheless he could research it and create his own taijutsu. Perhaps one day he might be able to create powerful forbidden taijutsu like morning peacock, afternoon tiger or so.


Standing on the street, and watching the bustling of crowds, Ren Tianyou relaxed. Now he had completed his assignment of academy, next step was to explore this so called Tower of Babel.


“Now I will see for myself what this space transfer passage of demon clan look like, which frighten countless people of this continent.” Taking a deep breathe, Ren Tianyou walked outside the city and prepared himself to return to the Supreme light academy.


Just at that time, Ren Tianyou suddenly sensed a powerful killing intent with his the mental perception. But this killing intent was not directed towards him, and was also not directed towards any other people, rather automatically being emitted. Ren Tianyou looked towards the location from where this killing intent was coming form with surprise. And a young man with a long silver hair wearing an old robe appeared in the line of sight of Ren Tianyou.


This young man had an angular face, a pair of eyebrows just like a scimitars, a white colored diamond shaped mark at his forehead, and he had a wine gourd hung on his waist. And what was most peculiar to Ren Tianyou about this man was, he was carrying 3 swords, a rapier, a dagger and a huge sword, and his body was automatically emitting a powerful killing intent. Each and every pedestrians were getting out of his way as if they were avoiding a primeval times savage beast.


“Pretty good killing intent, as if he had just killed a human. And it seems the number of people who had died from his hand is absolutely not a small number.” Looking at this youngster, Ren Tianyou thought inside his heart.


Then he looked at the ring which had Zero carved on it, and furthermore remembered remaining 9 similar rings and 9 black cloak with red clouds imprinted in it, “Hei hei, really sleepy for a long time and someone delivered a pillow, this fellow is best choice for White Tiger seat of my group. God of slaughterer—-White tiger!”


After thinking about this, Ren Tianyou cancelled the plan to immediately return to Supreme Light academy, rather turned around and followed this guy. But at this time, Ren Tianyou clearly discovered that several peoples were also stealthy following this guy. And all of them were not ordinary.


“F**k, who is this guy, actually having hatred of so many peoples, it seems I am not the only thinking about him.” Discovering that several peoples were following the tracks of this guy, Ren Tianyou helplessly thought.


That guy unexpectedly walked towards the exit of the city. Ren Tianyou and several peoples tailed behind this white haired youngster all the way outside the city. After walking for about 20 minutes after leaving the city, this youngster entered a small forest and stopped, then turning around, he coldly yelled, “All of you get your ass out!”


After this youngster yelled, along with several ‘swish’, ‘swish’……sounds, 7 experts with the power level of at least Swordsmaster appeared and surrounded this youngster.


“Humph, you bastard, we finally found you. This time we will see where you will be running.” One of the middle-aged man holding a huge sword and wearing a suit of armor spoke towards this guy with his voice full of hatred.


“Yes, that’s right. We 7 brothers were looking for you for 3 months, and we finally found you here. Now we will avenge our boss.” Yet another man who had surrounded this youngster roared.


…………………


After hearing the words of these 7 Sowrdsmaster which was filled with hatred, this youngster replied them as if he didn’t felt any pressure even after they had already surrounded him, “Who are you? Do we know each other?”


After this youngster spoke, all 7 Swordsmaster instantly became quiet for a moment. Then each and every one quivered, their forehead were filled with black lines, after that they thoroughly exploded towards this youngster, “You bastard, you killed our boss and now you are actually pretending to be ignorant.”


“I am going to kill this dumb idiot.”


…………………..


Ren Tianyou who was hiding behind a tree not far from this place, hearing the conversation of these peoples, he helplessly used his right hand to cover his face, “Ai, I have to say that this guy really is too terrible. With this type of unmatched taunting skill, I don’t know whether it will be good or bad for him to join my group.”


But Ren Tianyou didn’t have any time to sigh, because the brawl had already started, so he restrain himself from thinking useless things and had a look. After hearing the unmatched taunting of this youngster, all of them erupted with extreme rage, they immediately released battle qi, and holding huge swords in their hands, they dashed towards him.


“Ding”, “ding”…………….. 7 sound of metal colliding rang out. Just when the swords of those 7 men were about to hit the body of this youngster, this youngster immediately reached towards his waist, then rapier immediately appeared in his hand, and waving this rapier with his right hand, he firmly blocked the attack of these 7 men.


After that this youngster placed his left hand on the ground, while his right hand blocked the attack of these men, and used his legs to kick these men. Along with ‘peng’, ‘peng’…..sounds, all 7 were immediately sent flying by this kick.


After that firmly standing, this youngster looked at those men lying on the ground, and said indifferently, “Although I do not know who you are, but since you initiated to attack me, you are my enemy. Since you are my enemy………….”


The rapier in his hand suddenly release a towering sword intent, which was accompanied by boundless white colored battle qi, “Since you are my enemy, you must die.”


“Swish.” This youngster immediately turned into a white light beam and arrived in front of a man who had just stood up. “9 swords style, 1st style—-flowing light style!”


“Swish.” This light beam directly pierced through the body of this man. And behind his body the silhouette of that youngster who was holding a rapier appeared.


And that man whose body was pierced through felt that his body was stiff, and he slowly look down at his own body, and saw a big sword blade pattern wound on his body.


“Good speed, good sword.” These were the final words that was flashed in the mind of this man, then he lost his consciousness forever and fell to the ground.


One move and one Swordsmaster instantly got killed. Seeing this Ren Tianyou couldn’t help but narrowed his eyes. Under his Mangekyo Sharingan, the move of this silver haired youngster was extremely slow, so he could clearly see all the movement of that youngster.


“Old five.” Seeing the man lying on the ground, other 6 individuals roared with sorrow. The old five who was chatting and laughing with them just a few minutes ago, was now instantly changed into corpse. How could this not cause them grief and indignation.


But even after killing a person, this youngster didn’t have a slightest change in expression on his face, as if he had not murdered person. Even Ren Tianyou who was hiding not far from his place had not a single change in expression, because this was Divine wind continent, everyday many people are killed, this place was not a peaceful society like the original world Earth of Ren Tainyou. Since coming to this world, Ren Tianyou had already seen a great quantity of blood bath, and this had caused him to throw up many time previously, but now it’s already more than 2 years in this world, so his heart was already hardened.
